title: Cure for Cancer
itunes:title: Cure for Cancer
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Sometimes, the cure is worse than the disease...

***

Bonus episode: "Whatever you do, don’t stick out your tongue for snowflakes" Written by: PoloniumPoisoning and Narrated by: Megan McDuffee

***
